column4: wow, i'm back.. i was on ubuntu for a while, switched back to windows.. and now i remember why i hate windows.. i'm back to linux
switched back to windows to use adobe photoshop, pagemill, and other programs made for windows.. but the security issues just arent worth it.. i'd rather, MUCH rather, be on ubuntu
lol
it's been a while.. i forgot a lot of important stuff about ubuntu, so i appologize ahead for all the questions i might be asking
oh yea, speaking of upgrade.. is breezy badger worth downloading? i still have 5.04
yeah, more thatn ;)
all you do is change your apt sources and update/upgrade;
with a install x|k|ubuntu-desktop in the middle
paste your error in PM to me ;)
did you get that?
nope... have you registered? if not, goto #flood and paste there ;)
just pasted on #flood
paste me your sources.list too.
yea, sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
posted sources.list also
no dist-upgrade needed?
not yet, you'll need the -f install first
ok, -f install finished.. dist-upgrade now?
yep, if you did apt-get update first ;)
of course ;)
already running dist-upgrade.. was too impatient to wait for answer
